title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart - your perfect companion for all your gardening and hauling needs!

Crafted with a durable steel mesh frame, this sturdy cart is designed to withstand the test of time. Its quick assembly means you'll be ready to go in no time, while the removable side panels offer versatility for various tasks.

One of the standout features of this cart is its convertibility. With a simple adjustment, you can transform it into a flatbed cart, expanding its functionality. The 10-inch pneumatic tires ensure a smooth ride, even on rough terrain, while the 4-wheel design provides excellent stability and balance.

The tight turn radius and ample ground clearance make maneuvering this cart a breeze, even in tight spaces. With a capacity of 400 lbs and bed dimensions of 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width, this cart is perfect for hauling large loads.

The straight pull handle is designed for easy pulling and maneuvering, while the overall height of 37 inches and weight of 36.6 pounds ensure it's easy to handle. The cart comes with a 1-year limited warranty, giving you peace of mind. And with its vibrant green color, this cart not only performs well but looks great too!

Upgrade your gardening and hauling experience with the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart today!
